text:
## NYC Open Streets Locations

This is an automated dataset that pulls a list of NYC Open Street Locations with geometries from a publicly-accessible ArcGIS FeatureServer published by the NYC Department of Transportation.  

The same feed powers [this list of open streets on the DOT website](https://www1.nyc.gov/html/dot/html/pedestrians/openstreets.shtml).

This qri automated dataset runs every 24 hours.
